readability_reflection: String concatenation is easier to read as it is more obvious what actions are being taken and where. It is much easier to see what variables are being addressed and how they are.
comprehension_debugging: Concatenation was much easier for me to translate versus interpolation, as I understood how to formulate the final result easier when looking at concatenation compared to interpolation.
preference_rationale: String concatenation would be my preferred choice, as it would be much easier to read for me, along with it being easier for me to debug.
learning_curve: My previous experience has most definitely contributed to me preferring concatenation, as I am much more used to it. This would result in me being able to read it easier.
suggestions_improvement: I do not think readability needs adjusted for either; it is just my preference that I would rather work with concatenation.
